root: ^"Through the static, a female voice comes through"

g-0: ^No way! I never thought this would happen. You've been dead or, well, asleep in your case, for a long time.
g-1: ^Huh? What are you, you say? What, you don't remember?
g-2: ^Well you're a robot, of course. One of the most advanced that... well, that HE made...

g-0: ^Yes. Since you're a robot, someone made you. My father was a brilliant inventor. He created you and a bunch of other robots. You've obviously noticed the spider bots. Those were his invention too. Though they went awry...
g-1: ^He died, however... His own inventions killed him
g-2: ^I'm a mechanic. I've been trying to get you working for a while. I replaced your battery recently hoping that would do the trick but it must've been dead. Perhaps some time in the sun recharged it.

g-0: ^Oh. That must be why you don't remember, the spider bots must've taken all of your memory sticks while you've been out of commission. I'm sure you can find them somewhere, or find some new ones
g-1: ^Okay, be careful out there. Come find me and I'll see if I can help you out.
